item.title: Allegiant Air adds 5 new routes across 8 cities, including 1 new destination
item.description: Budget airline Allegiant Air has unveiled its latest expansion with five new routes covering eight cities, most notably Huntsville, Alabama.

item.title: Delta cuts nearly 20% of NYC flying during peak winter schedule
item.description: Delta Air Lines is cutting nearly 20% of its flying from its two hubs in New York City during one of the slowest winter months.
